title: Is Less More? Analyzing Ratings by Recipe Complexity
description: In our fast-paced world people have come to appreciate convenience and appreciate time savings anywhere possible, so are recipe ratings perhaps biased towards quick-and-easy solutions to feeding ourselves and our families? We analyze a dataset of over 400,000 recipes to find out.

title: The Current State of Data Science: Compensation and Representation
description: As Data Science & Machine Learning evolves as one of the most dynamic and impactful domains in technology, we want to analyze trends and patterns using the 2020 Kaggle DS & ML Survey, which gathered responses from over 20,000 participants across 171 countries and territories.

title: Computer Architecture Antics: Building a Raspberry Pi Mini Arcade.
description: Taking Computer Architecture just to build a personal arcade and have a legitimate excuse to allocate time for videogames. ðŸ˜Œ ðŸŒ¸
